file_content.text: You leaving now? That sort of thing is bad for business, you know.
Evening, my friends.
Evening, mistress.
Evening, sir.
What can I offer to wet your throat and bring a smile to your lips?
Point me to Harez Bant and no one gets hurt.
I'm hunting Republic scum.
You can guess.
I--is this about Harez?
Andoan ale for everyone. Then tell me where to find Harez Bant.
Drinks all around.
A mug of your best. Then tell me where to find Harez Bant.
Andoan ale.
Men were looking for him yesterday, too. Imperial Intelligence. Whatever he did, I don't want to know.
Harez! Leave the girls alone and get over here. Someone wants you.
Quite a few someones. How can I help you fine Imperial citizens?
Tell us how a spy seduced a fine Imperial wife like Kelara Sakoal.
Talk to us.
Hell-ooo, mistress. How can I make your day a little more exciting?
Like you made Kelara Sakoal's day more exciting?
You do that a lot, huh?
And what does such a respected Sith want with Harez Bant?
I'm working. What's your business?
You've got something that belongs to the Imperial Army.
Give back what you stole.
Possible. I get a lot of gifts, you know. It'd be rude to refuse them.
Tell me what you know about Kelara Sakoal.
Talk to me.
Kelara... can't say I recall that one.
There was a girl last night--these spikes like little thorns all down her neck. I've never even seen an alien like--well... I guess that's not who you're here about.
You're a dead man.
Now, now. We're all friends here. Just tell me what you want.
I'm here to get back what you stole from Officer Sakoal.
Return the plans.
All right. I know the Sakoal girl. Hardly worth this hassle; little twit barely knew how to kiss a man. But yeah, I've been there.
She gave me a few things. For safekeeping. Here they are.
Give me the plans, and you go home with your head.
Don't play innocent.
Stop playing dumb.
Okay, okay. You're talking about the package I snagged from the Sakoal girl, right?
Good looker, that one, but not much between the ears. Anyway, here they are.
It's just some data discs. I don't even know what's on them.
Was Kelara in on this? Did she give you the discs?
And the girl?
You think she's innocent? She knew who I was. But when we were together, we weren't talking politics.
I want names and locations on all your accomplices.
Who else is involved?
Ha, talk to every bored wife in Sobrik.
Stop right there.
Hey, you've got the stash. We're done here.
Just make sure you're out of Imperial space by sundown.
Fine. No one dies.
Republic ladies are in for a treat.
For you, sweetie? Anything.
Don't worry. You're not my type.
Try not to bleed all over the discs.
All done? Time to die.
Not in my cantina!
No--!
Andoan ale on special tonight.
